formulas.expression: IF(NOT({!Found_App_Configurations_True}), "FLE001", IF(NOT({!Found_Event_Configurations_True}), "FLE002" , IF( NOT({!AssetId_Not_Null_True}) && NOT({!User_ID_and_Product_Not_Null_True}) && NOT({!User_ID_Not_Null_and_Product_Null_True}) && NOT({!Phone_Not_Null_True}), "FLE003", IF( NOT({!Found_Asset_Record_True}) && NOT({!User_ID_and_Product_Not_Null_True}) && NOT({!User_ID_Not_Null_and_Product_Null_True}) && NOT({!Phone_Not_Null_True}), "FLE004" , IF( NOT({!Found_Asset_Record_True}) && NOT({!Found_Contact_Record_True}), "FLE005", IF( NOT({!AssetId_Not_Null_True}) && NOT({!Found_Contact_Record_True}), "FLE006" , IF( {!AssetId_Not_Null_With_Valid_UserId_True} ,"FLE007", IF( {!Validate_External_System_Failed}, "FLE008", IF( {!ParentAssetId_Not_Null_With_Valid_UserId_And_Not_Valid_AssetId_True},"FLE009" , IF( {!Validate_Incoming_ParentAseetId_With_Asset_ParentAseetId_Failed},"FLE010" , IF( {!Validate_if_there_is_an_Account_record_to_Contact_False},"FLE011" , IF( NOT({!Found_External_System_True}),"FLE012", IF({!ZeroExternalId},"FLE013", IF({!MultipleExternalId},"FLE014", "") ) )) ) ) ))))))))
